title: Dollchan 8: Infinity
description: The Brainscorcher has been shut down, but strange cases of memory loss spread among Stalkers. Seems like the zone found another way to prevent the uncovering of its secrets. An intriguing plot, heavily expanded maps, and brutal difficulty.

title: Dreamcatcher
description: Sequel to Incubator (that I recommend playing first), we follow a rookie scientist's first steps into the Zone, on a mission full of danger and mysticism. Highly atmospheric, ambitious graphics, with a rich story and must-play side quests.

title: GoldSphere
description: A wild and unhinged adventure set four years before Shadow of Chernobyl, mixing lots of open quests, puzzles, and bizarre occult mysteries. Full of Roadside Picnic references, it turns the Zone into a chaotic, unpredictable experience.

title: Incubator
description: An ominous antagonist coming after you, a great intrigue to slowly uncover, elevated by fully voiced characters, amazing cinematic cutscenes and an overall impressive production value, this is a must-play classic by the Vivient team.

title: Legend Returns
description: The largest story-driven overhaul for Call of Chernobyl, blending open-world, freeplay gameplay with full plots and storylines to discover for multiple factions. Special attention was given to Sin and their quests, making it a must-play faction!

title: Spatial Anomaly
description: Trapped in a strange anomaly, you're slowly running out of resources. A short, well-paced adventure with outstanding writing, memorable characters, captivating voice acting, in a world that won't let you go until the very end.

title: True Stalker
description: A brand new story in a vibrant and dangerous Zone, with a level of polish and quality so high it could pass for an official sequel. Great world design, custom UI, new audio, balanced and challenging gameplay, and the OG games spirit.

title: Vector of Alienation
description: A deep sci-fi thriller that reimagines S.T.A.L.K.E.R.'s 2004 original storyline. Fully overhauled environments, well crafted plotlines and alternate endings, with a tense, atmospheric journey through a lonelier, more mysterious Zone.

title: Wind of Time
description: After a mysterious emission, the Zone has begun to devour everything, threatening all life on the planet. A time machine is invented to send a military specialist to the past, find the source of the Zone instability and prevent humanity's extinction.
